name: Subalgebra.lTensorBot_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Semiring S
inst✝ : Algebra R S
A : Subalgebra R S
x : R
a : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x
⊢ Eq (A.lTensorBot (TensorProduct.tmul R ((algebraMap R (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem Bot.bot x)) x) a)) (HSMul.hSMul x a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem lTensorBot_tmul (x : R) (a : A) : A.lTensorBot (algebraMap R _ x ⊗ₜ[R] a) = x • a :=
  (toSubmodule A).lTensorOne_tmul x a

name: Subalgebra.lTensorBot_one_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Semiring S

A : Subalgebra R S
a : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x
⊢ Eq (A.lTensorBot (TensorProduct.tmul R 1 a)) a
decl:
@[simp]
theorem lTensorBot_one_tmul (a : A) : A.lTensorBot (1 ⊗ₜ[R] a) = a :=
  (toSubmodule A).lTensorOne_one_tmul a

⊢ Eq (A.lTensorBot.symm a) (TensorProduct.tmul R 1 a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem lTensorBot_symm_apply (a : A) : A.lTensorBot.symm a = 1 ⊗ₜ[R] a := rfl

name: Subalgebra.comm_trans_lTensorBot
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : Semiring S
inst✝ : Algebra R S
A : Subalgebra R S
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.comm R (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x) (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem Bot.bot x)).trans A.lTensorBot) A.rTensorBot
decl:
@[simp]
theorem comm_trans_lTensorBot :
    (Algebra.TensorProduct.comm R _ _).trans A.lTensorBot = A.rTensorBot :=
  AlgEquiv.toLinearEquiv_injective (toSubmodule A).comm_trans_lTensorOne

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange_toLinearMap
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3

inst✝³ : Semiring S
inst✝² : Algebra R S
inst✝¹ : Semiring T
inst✝ : Algebra R T
⊢ Eq (↑(Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange R S T)) (TensorProduct.map Algebra.TensorProduct.includeLeft.toLinearMap.rangeRestrict Algebra.TensorProduct.includeRight.toLinearMap.rangeRestrict)
decl:
theorem linearEquivIncludeRange_toLinearMap :
    (linearEquivIncludeRange R S T).toLinearMap =
      _root_.TensorProduct.map includeLeft.toLinearMap.rangeRestrict
        includeRight.toLinearMap.rangeRestrict := rfl

initialProofState:

inst✝ : Algebra R T
⊢ Eq (↑(Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange R S T).symm) ((LinearMap.range Algebra.TensorProduct.includeLeft).mulMap (LinearMap.range Algebra.TensorProduct.includeRight))
decl:
theorem linearEquivIncludeRange_symm_toLinearMap :
    (linearEquivIncludeRange R S T).symm.toLinearMap =
      (LinearMap.range includeLeft).mulMap (LinearMap.range includeRight) := rfl

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3

inst✝² : Algebra R S
inst✝¹ : Semiring T
inst✝ : Algebra R T
x : S
y : T
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange R S T) (TensorProduct.tmul R x y)) (TensorProduct.tmul R (Algebra.TensorProduct.includeLeft.rangeRestrict x) (Algebra.TensorProduct.includeRight.rangeRestrict y))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem linearEquivIncludeRange_tmul (x y) :
    linearEquivIncludeRange R S T (x ⊗ₜ[R] y) =
      ((includeLeft : S →ₐ[R] S ⊗[R] T).rangeRestrict x) ⊗ₜ[R]
        ((includeRight : T →ₐ[R] S ⊗[R] T).rangeRestrict y) := rfl

initialProofState:

inst✝ : Algebra R T
x : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem Algebra.TensorProduct.includeLeft.range x
y : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem Algebra.TensorProduct.includeRight.range x
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.linearEquivIncludeRange R S T).symm (TensorProduct.tmul R x y)) (HMul.hMul ↑x ↑y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem linearEquivIncludeRange_symm_tmul (x y) :
    (linearEquivIncludeRange R S T).symm (x ⊗ₜ[R] y) = x.1 * y.1 := rfl

name: Subalgebra.mulMap_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring S
inst✝ : Algebra R S
A B : Subalgebra R S
a : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x
b : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem B x
⊢ Eq ((A.mulMap B) (TensorProduct.tmul R a b)) (HMul.hMul ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mulMap_tmul (a : A) (b : B) : mulMap A B (a ⊗ₜ[R] b) = a.1 * b.1 := rfl

name: Subalgebra.mulMap_map_comp_eq
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : CommSemiring S
inst✝² : Algebra R S
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring T
inst✝ : Algebra R T
A B : Subalgebra R S
f : AlgHom R S T
⊢ Eq (((Subalgebra.map f A).mulMap (Subalgebra.map f B)).comp (Algebra.TensorProduct.map (AlgHom.subalgebraMap A f) (AlgHom.subalgebraMap B f))) (f.comp (A.mulMap B))
decl:
theorem mulMap_map_comp_eq (f : S →ₐ[R] T) :
    (mulMap (A.map f) (B.map f)).comp
      (Algebra.TensorProduct.map (f.subalgebraMap A) (f.subalgebraMap B))
        = f.comp (mulMap A B) := by
  ext <;> simp

⊢ Eq (A.mulMap B).toLinearMap ((Subalgebra.toSubmodule A).mulMap (Subalgebra.toSubmodule B))
decl:
theorem mulMap_toLinearMap : (A.mulMap B).toLinearMap = (toSubmodule A).mulMap (toSubmodule B) :=
  rfl

name: Subalgebra.mulMap_comm
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring S
inst✝ : Algebra R S

⊢ Eq (B.mulMap A) ((A.mulMap B).comp ↑(Algebra.TensorProduct.comm R (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem B x) (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x)))
decl:
theorem mulMap_comm : mulMap B A = (mulMap A B).comp (Algebra.TensorProduct.comm R B A) := by
  ext <;> simp

name: Subalgebra.mulMap_range

⊢ Eq (A.mulMap B).range (Max.max A B)
decl:
theorem mulMap_range : (A.mulMap B).range = A ⊔ B := by
  simp_rw [mulMap, Algebra.TensorProduct.productMap_range, Subalgebra.range_val]

name: Subalgebra.mulMap_bot_left_eq
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring S

⊢ Eq (Bot.bot.mulMap A) (A.val.comp ↑A.lTensorBot)
decl:
theorem mulMap_bot_left_eq : mulMap ⊥ A = A.val.comp A.lTensorBot.toAlgHom :=
  AlgHom.toLinearMap_injective (toSubmodule A).mulMap_one_left_eq

decl:

  AlgHom.toLinearMap_injective (toSubmodule A).mulMap_one_right_eq

name: Subalgebra.val_mulMap'_tmul

S : Type u_2

inst✝ : Algebra R S
A B : Subalgebra R S
a : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem A x
b : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem B x
⊢ Eq (↑((A.mulMap' B) (TensorProduct.tmul R a b))) (HMul.hMul ↑a ↑b)
decl:
variable {A B} in
@[simp]
theorem val_mulMap'_tmul (a : A) (b : B) : (mulMap' A B (a ⊗ₜ[R] b) : S) = a.1 * b.1 := rfl

name: Subalgebra.mulMap'_surjective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring S
inst✝ : Algebra R S
A B : Subalgebra R S
⊢ Function.Surjective ⇑(A.mulMap' B)
decl:
theorem mulMap'_surjective : Function.Surjective (mulMap' A B) := by
  simp_rw [mulMap', AlgEquiv.toAlgHom_eq_coe, AlgHom.coe_comp, AlgHom.coe_coe,
    EquivLike.comp_surjective, AlgHom.rangeRestrict_surjective]
